educational.body: Most DIYers don't know that grout joints need to be completely clean and dry before grouting. Even tiny amounts of thinset or moisture cause discoloration and weak bonds. Here's the pro method: vacuum thoroughly, use a margin trowel to scrape joints, then wait 24-72 hours depending on conditions. Professional tile contractors know that patience here prevents callbacks and ensures your tile looks perfect for decades.
